document_data.name: ''Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale''''' was a unique set of [[enchanted]] armor once worn by the hero of the [[Battle of Ingdal's Arm]].
document_data.Powers: ''Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale'' was an [[iron]] set of [[heavy armor]]. It possessed a humble ''+1'' defensive enchantment. However, what made it distinct was the magic that created a ''[[sound burst]]'' every time the wearer of the mail was hit.
document_data.History:
This enchanted armor belonged to [[Fennibal Bale]], a hero who lost his life in the {{YearlinkName|1065}} during the Battle of Ingdal's Arm. The one-man wrecking crew wore the armor when he charged directly into the [[human]] infantry on the other side of the conflict. He single-handedly knocked them back, eventually allowing his allies to win the battle.

As of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, ''Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale'' was in the hands of one of the exotic and magic gear vendors doing business in [[Westgate]]'s [[Market Triangle]].
